channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Klarna revives IPO plans, aims to raise $1.27B
item.description: Swedish buy-now, pay-later (BNPL) startup Klarna and its shareholders are reviving its initial public offering, hoping to raise as much as $1.27 billi...

item.title: Hungry Worms Could Help Solve Plastic Pollution
item.description: Researchers are working on manipulating wax worms’ digestive systems to create a scalable way of disposing of plastic.

item.title: Astro Teller, “Captain of Moonshots,” joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 this October
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 is about to get even more exciting. We’re thrilled to announce that Astro Teller, the head of Alphabet’s X (aka the Moonshot F...

item.title: Onion CEO Ben Collins Hasn't Given Up on Print—or Buying Infowars
item.description: A year after relaunching The Onion as a newspaper, Collins visits Uncanny Valley to talk about why “going into something and not ruining it is bravery...

item.title: 9 Best Electric Cargo Bikes for Families (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve spent years riding and testing extra-large ebikes, perfect for hauling both little ones and groceries around town.

item.title: Indian grocery startup Citymall raises $47M to challenge ultra-fast delivery giants
item.description: Indian e-commerce startup Citymall, which focuses on budget-focused grocery delivery for tier 2 and tier 3 towns, said today that it has raised $47 mi...

item.title: Do You Need a Satellite Messenger?
item.description: Sometimes you need more than a smartphone to stay safe on big adventures.

item.title: The ‘Final Fantasy Tactics’ Refresh Gives Its Class-War Story New Relevance
item.description: The Ivalice Chronicles updates the small things in the 28-year-old game but sticks to the original’s script. That’s by design, says its director.

item.title: Just 4 days left to exhibit at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 — 10 tables remain
item.description: The clock is ticking, and exhibit space at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 is moving fast. With just 4 days and 10 table left to book, now’s the time to stop ...

item.title: BMW, I am so breaking up with you
item.description: I’m driving my i4 back to the dealership as my lease is over. I'm surprised to say I can't wait.
